ApproxsimClient.treeview
Class PointAdapter

java.lang.Object
  ApproxsimClient.treeview.ApproxsimObjectAdapter
      ApproxsimClient.treeview.PointAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
EventListener, MutableTreeNode, TreeModel, TreeNode, ApproxsimObjectAdapter, ApproxsimEventListener
public class PointAdapter
extends ApproxsimObjectAdapter

PointAdapter adapts Points for viewing in the tree.
